author: newsr.in
title: Russia’s Yandex teams up with Microsoft for Windows 10
text: MOSCOW (Reuters by Maria Kiselyova) – Russia’s biggest search engine Yandex said on Tuesday Microsoft would offer it as the default homepage and search tool for Internet browsers across its Windows 10 platform in Russia and several other countries. The companies have signed a strategic cooperation agreement, under which users in Belarus , Kazakhstan, Russia, Turkey […] »
